body.p: There are 3 types of TokenScript specifications. Throughout a standardisation process they may eventually become separate standards, but presently they are all housed under TokenScript in 3 streams of development.This is a work in progres to move documents from old TokenScript repository. Will take a few weeks to accomplish.

dlentry.dd: For a website to use tokens. For example, how to render a token on your website.
These include: how to use TokenScript engine features, like creating and reading a DataObject, passing Payload for signing, and how to select a token or launch a Token Card from a website.
These are specs about TokenScript XML elements and their uses.
